data.eml:eml: Supplement to the knowledge of the genus Scaphidium Olivier of East China (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Scaphidiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tu, Yue-Ye, Tang, Liang (2017): Supplement to the knowledge of the genus Scaphidium Olivier of East China (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Scaphidiinae). Zootaxa 4268 (4): 593-596, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4268.4.11
